title: Bartender

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Serve drinks at your target's house, every night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If they are visited by a non Town non Neutral Benign role, all visitors are roleblocked.
- If they visit a non Town non Neutral Benign role, roleblock your target' visitor.
- If neither of those happen, you will cope.
- You will not know if you roleblocked anyone.

desc:
Post 579
*I kill Bart. I am the Bart Ender.*
Roleblock Immunity
